block.p: MERRILL LYNCH, New York, named Kevan Watts, executive chairman at the Asia Pacific business, to the post of co-chief of investment banking, based in London. Also, Richard Saltzman, who oversees real estate and leveraged finance, was named chief operating officer for global investment banking.
NOVARTIS PHARMACEUTICALS, East Hanover, N.J., named Gary E. Rosenthal vice president and chief financial officer, succeeding Urs Naegelin, who was named chief financial officer at Novartis Corp.
